resources.string: Any expenses always belong to a certain category. You can modify or add new categories which cover your everyday expenses. Set the expenses limit for corresponding time range for each category. Expenses limit means the maximum amount of funds you expect to spend within this category during the defined time range (week/month/year).
Add all your expenses here by entering the expense amount, date, category and expense details. Expenses are displayed within the certain time range, defined by the selected tab.

Set the time range by tapping on dates. The expenses percentage in relation to category\'s expense limit will be displayed. Changing time range will cause the recalculation of the expense limit and the expenses percentage as well.

Set the time range by tapping on dates. The relative percentage distribution of category expenses will be displayed. Changing time range will cause the recalculation of the category expenses percentage.
The expenses for selected category and time range are displayed here in the view mode only.
Here you can set up your currency and a number of time range tabs displayed in the Expenses section. Also you may export expenses data into CSV.
